GSD.description:
Bluetooth: Fix crash when replugging CSR fake controllers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit dc8fa6570deadb70c3fb74d7cd8ce38849feaed0. For more details please see the references link.
